relation: Focus on Beer Quality / CBC Preview
textBeforeTable: Editorial Calendar and Advertising Deadlines Preview a FREE copy of The New Brewer The New Brewer reports trends, technical information, news from the federal, court and state levels of industry regulation, new products available in the brewing world, recent sales data and statistics for the craft beer industry, an up-to-date supplier list, events and beer happenings and much, much more! Packed with brewing techniques, business and marketing issues and operations information, The New Brewer is a trusted and often referenced guide to success in the brewing industry. Brewery owners, brewers, marketing directors, operations managers and other industry professionals turn to The New Brewer for the advice and knowledge they need to succeed, and they’ll turn to your business when they see your advertisement on the pages of this valuable resource. Tap into the lucrative craft brewing industry by advertising in America’s premier professional brewing magazine, The New Brewer. Over 27,000 brewing industry professionals read The New Brewer.
